title: Deltron 3030 Announce Anniversary Tour
description: Del the Funky Homosapien, Dan the Automator, and Kid Koala will perform their cult-favorite 2000 album in full across North America
author: Nina Corcoran
excerpt: Del the Funky Homosapien, Dan the Automator, and Kid Koala will perform their cult-favorite 2000 album in full across North America
text: Deltron 3030—the hip-hop trio of rapper Del the Funky Homosapien, producer Dan the Automator, and DJ Kid Koala—are ringing in the 25th anniversary of their self-titled debut with a North American tour later this year. The artists will play the 2000 album in full at each show. Check out their full list of tour dates below.The Deltron 3030 anniversary tour begins on July 18, in Vancouver, British Columbia, with the trio making its way down the West Coast the ensuing nights. After a short pause, Deltron 3030 start back up on September 24, in Minneapolis, and perform in select American and Canadian cities. The tour currently ends on October 6 in New York. Slated to open those shows are Kid Koala and Lealani.Back in 2016, Deltron 3030 quietly released a live album featuring renditions of their Event II songs with collaborators Zack de la Rocha, Mike Patton, Jamie Cullum, and more joining them onstage.All products featured on Pitchfork are independently selected by our editors. html:
Deltron 3030—the hip-hop trio of rapper Del the Funky Homosapien, producer Dan the Automator, and DJ Kid Koala—are ringing in the 25th anniversary of their self-titled debut with a North American tour later this year. The artists will play the 2000 album in full at each show. Check out their full list of tour dates below.

The Deltron 3030 anniversary tour begins on July 18, in Vancouver, British Columbia, with the trio making its way down the West Coast the ensuing nights. After a short pause, Deltron 3030 start back up on September 24, in Minneapolis, and perform in select American and Canadian cities. The tour currently ends on October 6 in New York. Slated to open those shows are Kid Koala and Lealani.

Back in 2016, Deltron 3030 quietly released a live album featuring renditions of their Event II songs with collaborators Zack de la Rocha, Mike Patton, Jamie Cullum, and more joining them onstage.

All products featured on Pitchfork are independently selected by our editors. However, when you buy something through our retail links, we may earn an affiliate commission.

Deltron 3030: 25th Anniversary Tour

Deltron 3030:

07-18 Vancouver, British Columbia - Commodore Ballroom
07-19 Seattle, WA - Pier 62
07-21 Portland, OR - Revolution Hall
07-23 San Francisco, CA - The Regency
07-25 Los Angeles, CA - Bellwether
07-26 Santa Ana, CA - Observatory
07-27 San Diego, CA - House of Blues
09-24 Minneapolis, MN - Uptown Theater
09-25 Chicago, IL - House of Blues
09-27 Detroit, MI - Majestic Theatre
09-28 Toronto, Ontario - The Concert Hall
09-29 Montreal, Quebec - Beanfield
10-02 Boston, MA - Big Night Live
10-03 Philadelphia, PA - Union Transfer
10-04 Washington, D.C. - 9:30 Club
10-06 New York, NY - Webster Hall
